attributes.action: We want to have Welsh Independence.
attributes.additional_details: Over centuries Wales has been owned and oppressed by England and the British rule, our culture and national identity has been stripped from us. Separating our self from the rest of the UK is a way of reclaiming our identity as a nation.
attributes.background:
We want Wales to be it's own country so we can have Independence,
our own laws and decision making ourselves.
We want freedom of language and the right to use welsh, also freedom of honouring Welsh culture and also making traditional Welsh holidays national holidays.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a decision for the people of Wales, so you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550579
